[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@fluid/lib-ethers](./lib-ethers.md) &gt; [SeisFluidStoreOption](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidstoreoption.md)

## SeisFluidStoreOption type

Possible values for the optional [useStore](./lib-ethers.ethersfluidconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) connection parameter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SeisFluidStoreOption = "blockPolled";
```

## Remarks

Currently, the only supported value is `"blockPolled"`<!-- -->, in which case a [BlockPolledFluidStore](./lib-ethers.blockpolledfluidstore.md) will be created.
